General.Name: Rimbunan Sawit Bhd
General.Description: Rimbunan Sawit Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the cultivation of oil palm in Malaysia. It offers crude palm oil, fresh fruit bunches, and palm kernel. The company owns plantation land in Miri, Kuching, and Sibu, Sarawak; and operates a palm oil mill in Bok Land District, Miri, Sarawak. In addition, it engages in the provision of management services. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Sibu, Malaysia.
